message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a competitive price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $10000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $11500. This is a reasonable compromise considering the value it will bring to your business.
